dct_description_sm: par A. H. Dufour ; George illustarvt. et dirext ; Ch. Smith sculpt.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
3 bar scales on map given in "Myriametres", "Rous ou stades hebraiques", and "Stades olymiques".
Shows topography, drainage, settlements, travel routes, territorial boundaries of the twelve tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
Inset map: Plan de Jérusalem ancienne.
